name: Guess We'll Have Another Scrap. You Can Only Risk Death While You're Still Alive!!
effect: [Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader is [Gol.D.Roger] and you have any DON!! cards given, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it. [Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.
